mapper.select: select planid, operatype, isormeasure, matchid from (select distinct t.planid, t.matchid, to_char(t.operatype) as operatype, o.isormeasure as isormeasure from m_measure_t t, m_operaconfig_t o where (t.planid like 'DH%' or t.planid like 'DM%') and t.suttle != 0 and t.validflag > 0 and t.operatype = o.operatype and o.isormeasure = 1 and (t.UPDATENCFLAG = 0 or t.UPDATENCFLAG is null) union all select distinct t.planid, t.matchid, to_char(i.operatype) as operatype, o.isormeasure from l_storein_item_t t, l_storein_t i, m_operaconfig_t o where (t.planid like 'DH%' or t.planid like 'DM%') and t.counts != 0 and t.matchid = i.matchid and t.validflag > 0 and i.operatype = o.operatype and o.isormeasure = 0 and (t.UPDATENCFLAG = 0 or t.UPDATENCFLAG is null))

select matchid, isormeasure from (select distinct t.planid, t.matchid, o.isormeasure as isormeasure from m_measure_t t, m_operaconfig_t o where t.suttle > 0 and t.validflag > 0 and t.operatype = o.operatype and o.isormeasure = 1 --and (t.UPDATENCFLAG = 0 or t.updatencflag is null) union all select distinct t.planid, t.matchid, o.isormeasure from l_storein_item_t t, l_storein_t i, m_operaconfig_t o where t.counts > 0 and t.matchid = i.matchid and t.validflag > 0 and i.operatype = o.operatype and o.isormeasure = 0 --and (i.UPDATENCFLAG = 0 or i.updatencflag is null) ) where planid = #{planid,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update m_measure_t t set t.UPDATENCFLAG = 1,t.UPDATENCDATE = sysdate where t.matchid = #{matchid,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
update l_storein_item_t t set t.UPDATENCFLAG = 1,t.UPDATENCDATE = sysdate where t.matchid = #{matchid,jdbcType = VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select planid, matchid, carno, operatype, isormeasure, materialcode, materialname, suttle, updatencflag, to_char(updatencdate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as updatencdate, to_char(suttletime,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as suttletime from (select distinct t.planid, t.matchid, t.carno, to_char(t.operatype) as operatype, o.isormeasure as isormeasure, t.materialcode, t.materialname, t.suttle/1000 as suttle, t.updatencflag, t.updatencdate, t.suttletime, t.cartype from m_measure_t t, m_operaconfig_t o where (t.planid like 'DH%' or t.planid like 'DM%') and t.suttle > 0 and t.validflag > 0 and t.operatype = o.operatype and o.isormeasure = 1 union all select distinct t.planid, t.matchid, i.carno, to_char(i.operatype) as operatype, o.isormeasure, t.materialcode, t.materialname, t.COUNTS, t.updatencflag, t.updatencdate, t.createdate, o.cartype from l_storein_item_t t, l_storein_t i, m_operaconfig_t o where (t.planid like 'DH%' or t.planid like 'DM%') and t.counts > 0 and t.matchid = i.matchid and t.validflag > 0 and i.operatype = o.operatype and o.isormeasure = 0) where 1 = 1
and suttletime >= to_date(#{begintime}, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and suttletime <= to_date(#{endtime}, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and planid like '%' || #{planid} || '%'
and matchid like '%' || #{matchid} || '%'
and carno like '%' || #{carno} || '%'
and materialname like '%' || #{materialname} || '%'
and updatencflag = #{updatencflag}
and cartype = #{cartype}

select t.planid, t.usermemo, t.arrivetime, t.sourcecode, t.sourcename, decode(t.typeflag,1, t.targetcode, i.targetcode)targetcode, decode(t.typeflag,1, t.targetname, i.targetname)targetname, i.materialcode, i.materialname, trim(decode(t.typeflag,1,i.carno,t.carno))carno, i.snumber, i.suttleapp, i.middlemanname, i.measureunit, decode(t.typeflag, 1, '到货单', '发运单') sysmemo, i.saleitemid, t.createdate, l_jugestatus_f(i.saleitemid, 0) status from l_interfaceinfo_t t left join l_interfaceinfo_item_t i on t.id = i.fid where t.validflag > 0
and to_date(t.arrivetime,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')>= to_date(#{begintime}, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and to_date(t.arrivetime,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') <= to_date(#{endtime}, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and t.planid like #{planid}||'%'
and (i.carno like #{carno}||'%' or t.carno like #{carno}||'%')
and i.materialname like #{materialname}||'%'
and t.targetname like #{targetname} ||'%'
and t.sourcename like #{sourcename}||'%'
and t.typeflag = #{sysmemo}
and i.isoruse = #{isoruse}
select FILEXMLNAME from L_TRAININTERFACE_TASK_T where CDATE > sysdate - 0.25 order by CDATE desc
